name: Ian's Potato-Vegetable Soup
author: Ian Riesterer
summary: One day I heard my mom talking about soup and my mouth started to water.  Next thing I knew, I was just putting a whole mess of stuff in a pot and cooking it, not expecting it to turn out.  When it was finished I was amazed, what a great soup!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
directions: In a large stock pot boil potatoes in water and add salt
Cook potatoes until tender and soft and then add carrots, celery, chopped onions, vegetable of your choice, oil and beef bouillon
Mix together and cook until all vegetables are soft
Add cream of celery soup and season with parsley, onion powder and pepper
If you desire a thinner type of soup you may want to add 1/2 cup of water
Heat soup through, stirring occasionally, and serve
